description: The Samastipur RTO (BR-33) serves as the primary transport regulatory body for the Samastipur district in Bihar, operating under the Darbhanga administrative division. This office is responsible for vehicle registration, driving license issuance, and the enforcement of the Motor Vehicles Act in a region known as a major agricultural center and a significant railway junction in Northern India. Located centrally at the Collectorate Building, it oversees transport services for a diverse area encompassing 20 blocks including Rosera and Dalsinghsarai.
address: District Transport Office, Collectorate Building, Uttarayan, Kasipur, Samastipur, Bihar
